name: Sharp Skirts
overview:
Whether you need advice and counsel on building a successful business or are ready to take your existing business to the next level, Sharp Skirts is your go-to site for knowledge and advice you can use.

We created this company to fill a vital need for women entrepreneurs: a knowledge-based support community for smart women pursuing their passions. The site leverages the experiences of its members to engender success for all, by connecting women with know-how to women who need to know.

Sharp Skirts is both an online interactive community and offline real-world meetings. The online site is comprised of member profiles and portfolios, discussion forums, and â€˜Swarms,â€™ real-time brainstorms conducted over video conference, teleconference, or live chat. The offline program consists of regular meetings held in cities around North America, featuring panel discussions, guest speakers, and networking sessions. The Sharp Skirts brand will ultimately serve as a marker of business success, as well as support of a vital cause â€“ increasing the amount and accomplishments of women in business.
